text: Francis Charles Gaudion (22 June 1882 – 12 July 1952) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Frank Gaudion's profile at Collingwood Forever Category:1882 births Category:1952 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players
title: Frank Gaudion
